original_text:
Amun’s Book
L’antica civiltà egizia è da sempre una delle più affascinanti. Partendo dal loro misterioso linguaggio geroglifico, alle loro gigantesche piramidi, il fascino dell’ignoto avvolge ogni loro elemento.
Non a caso molte delle storie di avventura che vediamo al cinema o nei libri prendono proprio l’Egitto come loro location principale. Tesori perduti, spesso anche maledetti dalle mummie dei faraoni sepolte nelle piramidi, sono al centro dei desideri di ricercatori ed esploratori, e più che volentieri, anche al centro delle slot machine.
Sono moltissime, infatti, le slot che usano come loro tematica le piramidi e l’antico Egitto, e Amun’s Book della Zeusplay è una di queste. Sarà all’altezza di tutte le altre che l’hanno preceduta? Riuscirà a distinguersi in un mercato pieno di prodotti simili? Scopriamolo con questa recensione, andando ad analizzare prima il comparto artistico e poi il gameplay.
Tra le rovine di Amun’s Book
Amun’s Book ci catapulta tra le rovine di un tempio o di una piramide. Il cielo notturno che avvolge la scena rafforza ancora di più l’aria di mistero, e l’unica fonte di luce sono due fiaccole, che rivelano la presenza di un sarcofago, e le statue di un gatto e di un cane.
Su questo sfondo, contornata da colonne di pietra, si erge la griglia 5×3 protagonista della slot machine. Nonostante alcuni elementi del design possano sembrare un po’ vecchi, il primo impatto della slot machine è sicuramente notevole. A trascinare il giocatore sempre di più nel tema ci sono anche i simboli presenti sulla griglia, anch’essi tutti a tema Egitto. Ta questi troviamo le lettere delle carte da gioco, in stile egiziano, scarabei, idoli, maschere di faraoni, un’esploratrice e il simbolo Wild, ovvero il libro di Amun che dà il titolo alla slot machine.
Tutti questi elementi vanno a braccetto, e l’unico che risulta essere un po’ fuori luogo è proprio l’esploratrice, che ha differenza di altre slot simili ad Amun’s Book non appare come protagonista e di conseguenza la sua presenza risulta essere poco incisiva.
Il comparto sonoro, seppur non eccezionale, svolge perfettamente il suo lavoro. In sottofondo abbiamo una musica solenne e misteriosa, accompagnata dal vento notturno che dona che quasi incute timore nel giocatore. Leggermente fuori luogo gli effetti sonori durante le giocate, che danno al via a una musica più squillante, ma che si interrompe appena i rulli finiscono di muoversi.
Amun’s Book: Alla ricerca del libro misterioso
Il gameplay di Amun’s Book è estremamente semplice. Come molte altre delle slot Zeusplay, ci troviamo di fronte a un’esperienza classica, senza elementi complessi che provano a ridefinire la definizione di slot machine.
Se per molte altre slot la semplicità può essere un punto di forza, qui rischia di far sprofondare il tema nel banale. L’antico Egitto è un’ambientazione utilizzata di continuo nel mondo delle slot, e vedere qualche novità nel gameplay non sarebbe stato male.
Ciò nonostante, Amun’s Book offre un’interessante funzione di giri gratuiti. Trovando 3 o più scatter, il libro di Amun si aprirà rivelando un simbolo casuale. Nelle successive 10 giocate gratuite, quel simbolo vincerà in ogni posizione.
Una nota di merito per il buonissimo RTP del 97%.
Slot Simili ad Amun’s Book
Di slot simili ad Amun’s Book ce ne sono molte, e se siete giò pronti a scoprire nuovi misteri nell’antico egitto vi consigliamo The Explorer’s Quest, sempre della Zeusplay, e Egyptian Experience.

raw_translation.response:
Amun's Book

The ancient Egyptian civilization has always been one of the most fascinating. From their mysterious hieroglyphic language to their giant pyramids, the allure of the unknown surrounds every aspect of their culture. It's no wonder that many adventure stories in films and books are set in Egypt. Lost treasures, often cursed by the mummies of pharaohs buried in the pyramids, are at the center of desires for researchers and explorers, and happily, also at the center of slot machines.

Indeed, there are many slots that use pyramids and ancient Egypt as their theme, and Amun’s Book by Zeusplay is one of them. Will it live up to the predecessors? Will it stand out in a market full of similar products? Let's find out in this review, by analyzing the artistic and gameplay components.

Among the Ruins of Amun’s Book

Amun’s Book teleports us to the ruins of a temple or a pyramid. The night sky that surrounds the scene reinforces the air of mystery, and the only source of light are two torches, which reveal the presence of a sarcophagus, and the statues of a cat and a dog. On this backdrop, surrounded by stone columns, the 5x3 reels of the slot machine emerge as the protagonist.

Although some design elements may seem a bit outdated, the first impact of the slot machine is undoubtedly impressive. The symbols present on the reels also contribute to the theme of Egypt. Among these, we find the letters of playing cards, in the Egyptian style, scarabs, idols, pharaoh masks, an explorer, and the Wild symbol, i.e., the book of Amun that gives the slot machine its name.

All these elements work hand in hand, and the only one that seems a bit out of place is the explorer. Unlike other slots similar to Amun’s Book, she doesn’t appear as the protagonist, and therefore her presence is not very impactful.

The sound component, while not exceptional, does the job perfectly. In the background, we have solemn and mysterious music, accompanied by the night wind that almost scares the player. The sound effects during the spins are slightly out of place, starting with a more shrill music but stopping as soon as the reels stop moving.

Amun’s Book: In Search of the Mysterious Book

Amun’s Book's gameplay is extremely simple. Like many other Zeusplay slots, we face a classic experience, without complex elements that try to redefine the definition of slot machines.

While simplicity can be a strong point for many slots, here it risks sinking the theme into the banal. Ancient Egypt is a setting continuously used in the world of slots, and seeing some novelty in the gameplay wouldn’t have been bad.

Nevertheless, Amun’s Book offers an interesting free spins feature. By finding 3 or more scatters, the book of Amun opens, revealing a random symbol. In the following 10 free spins, that symbol wins in every position.

A note of merit for the excellent RTP of 97%.

Similar Slots to Amun's Book

Many slots similar to Amun’s Book are available, and if you're ready to discover new mysteries in ancient Egypt, we recommend The Explorer's Quest, also by Zeusplay, and Egyptian Experience.

The ancient Egyptian civilization has always been one of the most fascinating. From their mysterious hieroglyphic language to their giant pyramids, the allure of the unknown envelops every element. It's no wonder that many adventure stories we see in movies or books are set in Egypt. Lost treasures, often cursed by the pharaohs' mummies buried in the pyramids, are at the center of researchers' and explorers' desires and, more than willingly, also in the center of slot machines.

There are countless slots that use pyramids and ancient Egypt as their theme, and Amun's Book by Zeusplay is one of them. Will it measure up to all the others that have come before it? Will it stand out in a market full of similar products? Let's find out with this review, starting with the art design and then the gameplay.

Among the ruins of Amun's Book
Amun's Book catapults us among the ruins of a temple or pyramid. The nighttime sky that envelops the scene reinforces the air of mystery, and the only source of light is two torches, which reveal the presence of a sarcophagus, and the statues of a cat and a dog. On this backdrop, surrounded by stone columns, stands the 5x3 grid that is the protagonist of the slot machine.

Despite some elements of the design that may seem a bit old-fashioned, the first impact of the slot machine is certainly noteworthy. To bring the player more and more into the theme, there are also symbols present on the grid, all of them also themed around Egypt. Among these are the playing card letters, in Egyptian style, scarabs, idols, pharaoh masks, an explorer and the Wild symbol, which is the book of Amun that gives the slot machine its name.

All these elements go hand in hand, and the only one that seems a bit out of place is the explorer, who unlike in other slots similar to Amun's Book, does not appear as a protagonist and therefore does not have much impact.

The sound design, while not exceptional, does its job perfectly. In the background, we have solemn and mysterious music, accompanied by the night wind that almost instills fear in the player. Slightly out of place are the sound effects during the spins, which trigger a more shrill music, but which stops as soon as the reels finish moving.

Amun's Book: In search of the mysterious book
The gameplay of Amun's Book is extremely simple. Like many other Zeusplay slots, we are faced with a classic experience, without complex elements that try to redefine the definition of a slot machine. While for many other slots, simplicity can be a strength, here it risks sinking the theme into banality.

Ancient Egypt is a setting used continuously in the world of slots, and seeing some novelty in the gameplay would not have been bad. Nevertheless, Amun's Book offers an interesting free spins feature.

By finding 3 or more scatters, the book of Amun will open, revealing a random symbol. In the next 10 free spins, that symbol will win in every position. A note of merit for the excellent RTP of 97%.

Review:
 
Design and Theme

The design of Amun's Book is noteworthy, with the background setting situated amidst the ruins of a temple or pyramid. The nighttime sky adds to the slot's air of mystery, with torches revealing the presence of a sarcophagus and statues of a cat and a dog. The playing grid is set amidst stone columns, with Egyptian-themed symbols such as scarabs, idols, pharaoh masks, and the Wild symbol, the book of Amun. While the explorer is present on the grid, unlike in other slots similar to Amun's Book, the explorer does not appear as a protagonist and therefore has little impact.

Gameplay Mechanics

The gameplay of Amun's Book is simple and classic, typical of many other Zeusplay slots. Some may appreciate the simplicity, but it risks making the theme sink into banality. The slot does offer an interesting free spins feature, where finding 3 or more scatters triggers the book of Amun to reveal a random symbol. The next 10 free spins will then see that symbol win in every position. The excellent RTP of 97% is also worth noting.

Bonus Features

The sole bonus feature in Amun's Book is the free spins feature, triggered by finding 3 or more scatters. The book of Amun will reveal a random symbol, and the next 10 free spins will see that symbol win in every position.

Jackpot Potential

There is no mention of a progressive jackpot or significant payouts in Amun's Book. However, the game offers an excellent RTP of 97%, which can be attractive to players.

Overall Impression

Amun's Book by Zeusplay is one of the many slots that use ancient Egypt as its theme. While the design of the game is immersive, it risks falling into a state of banality due to the simplicity of the gameplay. The free spins feature offers some excitement, but aside from that, there are no other bonus features in the game. Nevertheless, the game's exceptional RTP of 97% can be alluring to players.

Review: Amun's Book

The ancient Egyptian civilization has always been one of the most fascinating. From their mysterious hieroglyphic language to their giant pyramids, the allure of the unknown envelops every element. It's no wonder that many adventure stories we see in movies or books are set in Egypt. Lost treasures, often cursed by the pharaohs' mummies buried in the pyramids, are at the center of researchers' and explorers' desires and, more than willingly, also in the center of slot machines.

There are countless slots that use pyramids and ancient Egypt as their theme, and Amun's Book by Zeusplay is one of them. Will it measure up to all the others that have come before it? Will it stand out in a market full of similar products? Let's find out with this review, starting with the art design and then the gameplay.

Among the ruins of Amun's Book
Amun's Book catapults us among the ruins of a temple or pyramid. The nighttime sky that envelops the scene reinforces the air of mystery, and the only source of light is two torches, which reveal the presence of a sarcophagus, and the statues of a cat and a dog. On this backdrop, surrounded by stone columns, stands the 5x3 grid that is the protagonist of the slot machine.

Despite some elements of the design that may seem a bit old-fashioned, the first impact of the slot machine is certainly noteworthy. To bring the player more and more into the theme, there are also symbols present on the grid, all of them also themed around Egypt. Among these are the playing card letters, in Egyptian style, scarabs, idols, pharaoh masks, an explorer and the Wild symbol, which is the book of Amun that gives the slot machine its name.

All these elements go hand in hand, and the only one that seems a bit out of place is the explorer, who unlike in other slots similar to Amun's Book, does not appear as a protagonist and therefore does not have much impact.

The sound design, while not exceptional, does its job perfectly. In the background, we have solemn and mysterious music, accompanied by the night wind that almost instills fear in the player. Slightly out of place are the sound effects during the spins, which trigger a more shrill music, but which stops as soon as the reels finish moving.

Amun's Book: In search of the mysterious book
The gameplay of Amun's Book is extremely simple. Like many other Zeusplay slots, we are faced with a classic experience, without complex elements that try to redefine the definition of a slot machine. While for many other slots, simplicity can be a strength, here it risks sinking the theme into banality.

Ancient Egypt is a setting used continuously in the world of slots, and seeing some novelty in the gameplay would not have been bad. Nevertheless, Amun's Book offers an interesting free spins feature.

By finding 3 or more scatters, the book of Amun will open, revealing a random symbol. In the next 10 free spins, that symbol will win in every position. A note of merit for the excellent RTP of 97%.

Slots similar to Amun's Book
There are many slots similar to Amun's Book, and if you are ready to discover new mysteries in ancient Egypt, we recommend The Explorer's Quest, also by Zeusplay, and Egyptian Experience.
